title: FlashLight Wear
summary: Free flashlight app for your android wear device.
description: Free flashlight app for your android wear device. It is quite simple and practical. It uses your device’s camera flash or screen as a torch.*Flashlight -smartwatch is specifically designed for android wear devices to provide a bright flashlight on your device.*Screen light: If your device doesn’t have a camera flash, the screen functions as a torch, and it is bright enough for daily use. *Activate the flashlight by simply selecting the app and touching on the screen.*Use it both for your smartphone and smartwatch.Key words: flash light, torch, android wear, smartwatch, bright , watch , smart watch, wear , flash , light
descriptionHTML:
Free flashlight app for your android wear device. It is quite simple and practical. It uses your device’s camera flash or screen as a torch.
*Flashlight -smartwatch is specifically designed for android wear devices to provide a bright flashlight on your device.
*Screen light: If your device doesn’t have a camera flash, the screen functions as a torch, and it is bright enough for daily use.
*Activate the flashlight by simply selecting the app and touching on the screen.
*Use it both for your smartphone and smartwatch.
Key words: flash light, torch, android wear, smartwatch, bright , watch , smart watch, wear , flash , light
comments: Works on nexus 5 but doesn't work on Nexus4 With the new update it works on Nexus 5 but not on 4. Is there a way I can help?

Works great! I got this for my LG G watch and found it to surprisingly effective in a dark room, or to put more light on fine print in less than ideal daylight conditions.  The added bonus is I like the phone flashlight a lot better than the one I've been using for years!
